## R Markdown

```{r}

x = rbinom(n = 100, size = 1, prob = .562)

dataset1 = tibble(outcome = x)
pi_hat = mean(x)

glm1 = glm(outcome ~ 1, 
           data = dataset1,
           family = gaussian())

expit = function(x) (1 + exp(-x))^-1

glm1 |> coef() |> expit()

```
